gems.name: termpix
gems.info: Termpix v0.3.2: Fixed Kitty cache invalidation when files are overwritten. Cache key now includes file mtime. Uses Kitty graphics protocol for kitty, WezTerm, and Ghostty terminals. Provides clean API for displaying images in terminal using best available protocol (Kitty, Sixel, or w3m). Auto-detects terminal capabilities and falls back gracefully.
